identity.title: Determining the Letter Grade Of a Student

content.prompt:
Construct a program that receives a score from the user and determines the grade as follows:
A for scores ≥ 90
B for scores ≥ 80
C for scores ≥ 70
D for scores ≥ 60
F for scores < 60
